titles.title: Sustainable Property Grants Act of 2010

A bill to amend the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 to allow specified energy property grants to real estate investment trusts without regard to the ratable share income limitations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/29/2010--Introduced. Sustainable Property Grants Act of 2010 - Amends the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 to allow real estate investment trusts to qualify for energy property grants under such Act without affecting limitations on dividend payments applicable to such trusts.
